issues.description: The problem statement UML defines acceptSupplyDelivery with four parameters (supplier name, ingredient name, price, quantity), but the Main example and Solution implement it with only three parameters (ingredient name, price, quantity), causing confusion about the correct method signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the parameter list by removing the supplier name from the problem statement UML so acceptSupplyDelivery takes three parameters (ingredient name, price, quantity), or update the example and solution to include the supplierName parameter as specified.
